sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-verification-modal', templateUrl: './user-verification-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-verification-modal.component.css'] }) export class UserVerificationModalComponent { code: string[] = ['', '', '', '','']; phoneNumber: string = '+966'; autoTab(index: number, event: Event) { const input = event.target as HTMLInputElement; if (input.value.length === 1 && index < this.code.length - 1) { const nextInput = document.querySelectorAll('.code-input')[index + 1] as HTMLInputElement; nextInput.focus(); } } verifyCode() { // Implement verification logic here console.log('Verification code:', this.code.join('')); } resendCode() { // Implement resend code logic here console.log('Resending code...'); } }

Verification

Code has been send to (+966 ) 20 **** *678

Haven’t got the code yet? Resend Code
